entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Deep River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:16 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Pellets, -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Garrison Petawawa 3:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Ice Pellets
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: ESE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow with ice pellets changing to rain mixed with snow near midnight then to flurries overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
